module.name: usbmodules
module.summary: List kernel modules of USB devices

interface.name: usbmodules_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute usbmodules in the usbmodules domain.

interface.name: usbmodules_run
interface.summary: Execute usbmodules in the usbmodules domain, and allow the specified role the usbmodules domain, and use the caller's terminal.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the usbmodules domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the usbmodules domain to use.
